revision.text: <noinclude>{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMUpload |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template displays and annotates the metadata of uploaded media. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Calls template=Template:RMMedia }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} </noinclude><includeonly>{{RMMedia |Media subcategory=Media |CopyrightBy=[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |CreationDate=[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |RelatedArticles={{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticle::x]]|,}} |Filename=[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |Description=[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |Uploader=[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |UploadDate=[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |SubSectionOf={{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]|,}} |Keywords={{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]|,}} |Format=[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]] }}[[Category:Media]]</includeonly><noinclude> </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMList |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template lists all media which has been uploaded and attached to a particular article. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMList
|show=True}}
|Calls template=Template:RMListOuterTable |hints_for_templates_and_forms=To attach uploaded media to an article, the property }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 |hints_for_templates_and_forms=To attach uploaded media to an article, the property }}
{{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{RMListOuterTable}}|}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMListInnerTable |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Builds the inner table |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} |- | align="center" bgcolor="white" |{{{1}}}{{RMCategoryLinkIcon|{{{1}}}}} | bgcolor="white" |{{#rmew:{{{1}}}|{{RMNoNamespace|{{{2}}} }}|700|500}} | bgcolor="white" |[[{{{3}}}]] | bgcolor="white" |{{{4}}}{{{4}}} | align="center" bgcolor="white" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_info_icon_16x16.png][{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=formedit}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_edit_with_forms_icon_16x16.gif] | bgcolor="white" align="center" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=delete}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_delete_icon_16x16.png]

}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMListOuterTable |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Builds the outer table |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" |- ! style="padding: 7px 2px; background-color: rgb(17, 105, 136); color: white;" colspan="6" |Attached documents, images and media |} {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" |- style="border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" ! style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Category ! style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Filename ! style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Uploaded by ! class="unsortable" style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Creation date ! class="unsortable" style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Metainformation ! class="unsortable" style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Delete |- {{#ask: [[Category:Media]][[HasRelatedArticle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Image:+]]OR[[Document:+]]OR[[Pdf:+]]OR[[Video:+]]OR[[Audio:+]]OR[[ICalendar:+]]OR[[VCard:+]] | ?HasFilename | ?HasUploader | ?HasCreationDate | format=template | template=RMListInnerTable | link=none }} |} {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" ! style="border-top: 1px solid rgb(225, 224, 218);" colspan="6" | |- | colspan="2" | Manual refresh list: [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=purge}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_refresh_icon_16x16.gif] | style="text-align:right;vertical-align: top;" | {{#rmf: {{FULLPAGENAME}} }} |- ! style="border-top: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" colspan="6" | |}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMMedia |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template displays information of media (i.e. document, image, etc) in a box. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMMedia
|Media subcategory
|CopyrightBy
|CreationDate
|RelatedArticles
|Filename
|Description
|Keywords
|Format
|Uploader
|UploadDate
|SubSectionOf
}}
|Calls template=Template:Display content navigation box }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #aaa; background: #fff; float: right; clear: right; width: 20em" ! colspan="2" style="background: #996699; color: white" | ''{{{Media subcategory|}}}'' |- {{Tablerow|Label=Filename:|Value={{{Filename|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Copyright by:|Value={{{CopyrightBy|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Creation date:|Value={{{CreationDate|}}} }} |- {{#ifeq:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}||| {{Tablerow|Label=Related articles:|Value={{{RelatedArticles|}}} }} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Keywords:|Value={{{Keywords|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Format:|Value={{{Format|}}} }} |} {{Display content navigation box |Title={{{Filename|}}} |Summary={{{Description|}}} |Author={{{Uploader|}}} |Creation date={{{UploadDate|}}} |SubsectionOf={{{SubSectionOf|}}} }}

|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Cite web in help |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Displays a box in articles which fall under GFDL. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Cite web in help
|wiki=
|url=
|title=
|retrieved=
|publisher=
}}
}} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }}
;References
The content of this page uses material from the article [{{{url}}} {{{title}}}] published by {{{publisher}}} (retrieved on {{{retrieved}}}).
This article is licensed under the [[GNU Free Documentation License|GNU Free Documentation License]].

;Copyright © {{{year}}} {{{copyright holder}}}.

A copy of the license is included in the article "[[GNU_Free_Documentation_License|GNU Free Documentation License]]". 
{{

|year=
|copyright holder=
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}

'''Note –''' {{{1}}} 
{{Note|Note Text}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Person |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Sample template call === {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''not specified...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} === Interaction with other templates and forms === This template calls other templates: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} This template is populated by form(s): {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} [[Category:Template]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Display content navigation box |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section |rationale=This template is used for providing and annotating meta data fields for arbitrary content. |long description=__NOTITLE__ The template does the following *sets "subsection of" relationship and prints it as supersection(s) *queries for subsections and prints them *sets a title *sets author(s) if given *sets and prints a summary if given |parameters=The template should be called in the following format: 
{{Display content navigation box
|Title
|Summary
|Author
|Creation date
|SubsectionOf
}}
|hints for templates and forms=This template does include NO annotations! }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #aaa; background: #fff; float: right; clear: right; width: 20em" ! colspan="2" style="background: #aaa; color: black" | {{{Title|''no title specified''}}} |- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value={{{Summary|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Author(s):|Value={{{Author|''not specified''}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Creation date:|Value={{{Creation date|''not specified''}}} }} |- {{#ifeq:{{{SubsectionOf|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Belongs to:|Value=no article}}| {{Tablerow|Label=Belongs to:|Value={{{SubsectionOf|}}} }} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Includes:|Value={{#sparql:[[subsection of::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]][[subsection of::+]]|format=ul|link=all|default=
  • no article
}} }} |}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Property |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Displays a property and some essential metadata. |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Property |Icon=Image:smw_plus_property_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === New pages (i.e. "redlinks") which are related via this property shall use the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} [[Category:Property]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description=__NOTITLE__ You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part]]|[[Category:Category]]}}[[Is category::true| ]]

{{#ifeq:{{{heading|μ}}}| | |
{{#ifeq:{{{content|μ}}}|μ |{{#ifexist: {{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}} |[[{{fullurl:{{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}}|action=edit}} edit]] |[[{{fullurl:{{{1|{{Documentation/docname }}}}}|action=edit&preload=Template:Documentation/preload}} create]] }} }} {{#if:{{{heading|}}}|{{{heading}}}|{{#ifeq:{{NAMESPACE}}|{{ns:template}}|[[Image:Template-info.svg|50px]] Template documentation|Documentation}}}}
}}
{{#ifexist: {{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}} |This [[Wikipedia:Template documentation|documentation]] is [[Wikipedia:Transclusion|transcluded]] from [[{{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}}]]. ([{{fullurl:{{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}}|action=edit}} edit] | [{{fullurl:{{{1|{{Documentation/docname}}}}}|action=history}} history])
}}{{#switch: {{SUBPAGENAME}} |sandbox|testcases= |#default= {{#switch: {{SUBJECTSPACE}} |{{ns:template}} |{{ns:user}}= {{#ifexist: {{FULLPAGENAME}}/sandbox |This template has a [[/sandbox|sandbox]] ([{{fullurl:{{ #rel2abs: /sandbox }}|action=edit}} edit]) {{#ifexist: {{FULLPAGENAME}}/testcases |and [[/testcases|testcases]] ([{{fullurl:{{ #rel2abs: /testcases }}|action=edit}} edit])}} for editors to experiment. |{{#ifexist: {{FULLPAGENAME}}/testcases |This template has [[/testcases|testcases]] ([{{fullurl:{{ #rel2abs: /testcases }}|action=edit}} edit]) for editors to experiment.}} }}}}}}

This is the 'RMUpload' form. To add a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{{info|page name=RMUploadPage}}} {{{for template|RMUpload|label=Meta information|collapsable|forceopen=true}}} {| width="100%" align="center" |- | width="30%" | | width="70%" | |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Uploaded by*: | {{{field|Uploader|mandatory|input type=haloACtext|constraints=ask: [[Category:Person]]|default=current user|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   ||style="padding-bottom:5px;font-size:80%;font-style:italic"| (The name of the uploader.) |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Copyright by: | {{{field|CopyrightBy|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   || style="padding-bottom:5px;font-size:80%;font-style:italic" |(The name of the person/company who holds the rights of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Creation date*: | {{{field|CreationDate|mandatory|default=now}}} |- |   || style="padding-bottom:5px;font-size:80%;font-style:italic" |(The date when this file has been created or recently changed) |- | style="display:none"| {{{field|UploadDate|mandatory|default=now}}} |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Short description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|rows=3|cols=40}}} |- |   || style="padding-bottom:5px;font-size:80%;font-style:italic" | (Here you can enter a short description of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Keywords: | {{{field|Keywords|multiple|size=40}}} |- |   || style="padding-bottom:5px;font-size:80%;font-style:italic" |(Here you can tag the file with different keywords) |- | align="right" style="font-size:100%;font-weight:bold"| Related articles: | {{{field|RelatedArticles|input type=haloACtext|constraints=namespace:0|size=40}}} |- | are mandatory |} {{{end template}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Person |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Sample template call === {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''not specified...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} === Interaction with other templates and forms === This template calls other templates: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} This template is populated by form(s): {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} [[Category:Template]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Display content navigation box |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section |rationale=This template is used for providing and annotating meta data fields for arbitrary content. |long description=__NOTITLE__ The template does the following *sets "subsection of" relationship and prints it as supersection(s) *queries for subsections and prints them *sets a title *sets author(s) if given *sets and prints a summary if given |parameters=The template should be called in the following format: 
{{Display content navigation box
|Title
|Summary
|Author
|Creation date
|SubsectionOf
}}
|hints for templates and forms=This template does include NO annotations! }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #aaa; background: #fff; float: right; clear: right; width: 20em" ! colspan="2" style="background: #aaa; color: black" | {{{Title|''no title specified''}}} |- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value={{{Summary|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Author(s):|Value={{{Author|''not specified''}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Creation date:|Value={{{Creation date|''not specified''}}} }} |- {{#ifeq:{{{SubsectionOf|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Belongs to:|Value=no article}}| {{Tablerow|Label=Belongs to:|Value={{{SubsectionOf|}}} }} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Includes:|Value={{#sparql:[[subsection of::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]][[subsection of::+]]|format=ul|link=all|default=
  • no article
}} }} |}

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Subsection of |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section, |rationale=Allows attaching content to other content (e.g. projects, tasks, events and persons) in a hierarchical manner. |long description=__NOTITLE__ Denotes a content item as subsection of another content item. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Is inverse of::Property:HasSubsection| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Content; Category:Content| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Category:Transitive properties]]
